title: Millennial Socialists
description: Are millennials giving up on capitalism? A recent survey found a majority now prefer socialism. Luigi gets the scoop from our resident millennial, Kate, who says most simply want European-style social welfare, student-loan debt relief and campaign finance reform. Is that really so radical?
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (Chicago Booth Review)
